step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Focus on keeping your fingers open and relaxed during this part.
Great effort making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent job stretching your arms back overhead. Make sure to exhale fully as you relax your muscles.
You're completing the repetitions well. Continue to focus on the full range of motion and controlled breathing.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Keep stretching your arms overhead with open fingers and squeezing your shoulder blades as you make a fist. Remember to breathe deeply with each movement.
